(numRasEntries, numRobEntries).explanation: RAS entries for return address prediction and ROB entries for instruction retirement are independent microarchitectural resources with separate functions;

(numRasEntries, nL2TLBEntries).explanation: Return address stack size and L2 TLB entries serve completely different functions in the processor pipeline with no direct causal relationship;

(numRasEntries, area).explanation: Increasing the number of RAS entries requires additional storage hardware which directly increases the total chip area;
